Moves a few items around, regenerates Precombines where needed and make sure the Navmesh works nicely together.

State.Description: Replaces the vanilla Forsythia plant with Mushrooms.

State.Description: A substantial quest mod which adds a new town to the Commonwealth. Features ten main, thirty-six side quests, a fully-voiced player, over 5,000 lines of new dialogue, new set of collectable bobbleheads with perks, and plenty to explore and discover. Approximately 8-10 hours of new gameplay.
State.Name: Fourville

State.Author: Fuse00
State.Description: New 2K textures for male and female intelligent ghouls.
State.Name: Ghouls Revamped

State.Name: Glock 86 - Plasma Pistol

Darlene is fully voiced advanced companion for Fallout 4. 

She can be found inside Lexington apartments.



December 2018 Mod of the Month.

Once completed, you are rewarded over six Power Armor Paint Jobs , Desert Combat Armor, two unique legendary weapons, and your own Enclave themed Bunker player home located next to Sanctuary.

State.Description: Tired of lockpicking ? Shoot a bullet at that goddamn lock to open it ! Or do you prefer to blow it up with some explosive ? Oh wait, you just want to kick doors open with your shiny X-01 ? Well, you can do that as well.

Improves the effect of the M84 Flashbang and makes enemy blind and deaf in addition to the stagger animation. This allows you some new tactical gameplay!
